bilingual.target: 包括达芬奇的《蒙娜丽莎》。

bilingual.source: Decide on the main actors, including the narrator.
bilingual.target: 决定主要演员，包括旁白。
火山灰覆盖了附近的城镇，包括庞贝。

bilingual.source: Several artefacts, including a large bronze spear, were found.
bilingual.target: 发现了几件文物，包括一把大的青铜矛。

bilingual.source: They make various sounds, including whistles, squeaks and clicks.
bilingual.target: 它们发出各种声音，包括哨声、吱吱声和咔哒声。

bilingual.source: Many important colonists, including George Washington, read her poems.
bilingual.target: 许多重要的殖民者，包括乔治·华盛顿，都读过她的诗。

bilingual.source: It is not uncommon in Japan to eat rice at every meal including breakfast.
bilingual.target: 在日本，每顿饭包括早餐吃米饭是很常见的。

bilingual.source: Many people, including both locals and visitors, have climbed Yasur to see the top of the volcano.
bilingual.target: 许多人，包括当地人和游客，都爬上了亚苏尔山看火山顶。

bilingual.source: Later, Winton received various honours for his achievement, including a knighthood in 2003.
bilingual.target: 后来，温顿因其成就获得了各种荣誉，包括2003年的爵士头衔。

bilingual.source: Other people, including some English speakers from the UK and the US, were happy to talk to them.
bilingual.target: 其他人，包括一些来自英国和美国的英语使用者，很乐意和他们交谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Lots of people do summer at Sorbonne, including me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多人都在那补习，包括我。

yingyinNormal.en: And a number of parties were racing to capture him, including, of course, the United States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多方组织竞相要捕捉他，其中当然包括美国。

yingyinNormal.en: The show features every type of Chinese entertainment, including, of course, martial arts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚会囊括了中国各类娱乐形式，当然包括武术。

yingyinNormal.en: Everything around us, including the girl. Everything is temporary. We are forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们身边的一切，包括那个女孩。都是暂时的。我们才是永恒。

yingyinNormal.en: He saved over a thousand men, including the man who would become my husband as it turned out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他拯救了一千多个人，其中包括后来成为我丈夫的人。

yingyinNormal.en: You saved five of them. Including the control pillar. Only five? We once had hundreds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你保住了五根，包括控制柱。只有五根吗，我们以前有上百根的。

yingyinNormal.en: The world had been full of many different plant eaters including the vast balachetherium.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地球上曾出现过许多不同种类的草食动物，包括巨型俾路支兽。

yingyinNormal.en: We will limit her contact with people and keep her powers hidden from everyone, including Anna.
yingyinNormal.zh: 减少她与人们的交往，让她的魔力不被人所知，包括安娜。

yingyinNormal.en: Every part of this building, including the skin on your back, is made to keep you here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这栋楼里的一切，包括你背后的皮肤，都是为了把你留在这里而存在。

yingyinNormal.en: They've been handing tips gleaned from their surveillance on to other departments, including the DEA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们一直把监视过程中收集到的信息传达给其他部门，包括缉毒局。

yingyinNormal.en: But then you made reference to something about two very close friends that's nobody's business, including yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你提到了两个非常亲密的朋友的事这不关任何人的事，包括你。

yingyinNormal.en: Your father was captain of a starship for 12 minutes. He saved 800 lives, including your mother's and yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的父亲当了12分钟舰长，他救了800条命，包括你们母子俩的。

yingyinNormal.en: This ski resort in the desert, features five ski runs, including the world's first indoor black diamond slope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个沙漠上的滑雪渡假村设有5种滑道，包括全球第一条室内黑钻雪道。

yingyinNormal.en: They sculpted the very surface of the Earth and they drove the evolution of all animals including our own ancestors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 植物刻画出地球每一寸肌肤推动了动物的进化，包括我们人类的鼻祖。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you don't. And just think about the resources, including time that would be spent trying to get back here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，没错，再想想将要消耗的资源，包括时间，在试图回到这里的过程中。

yingyinNormal.en: Sully, watch the news. You're a hero. Everyone's gonna have to get used to it, including the NTSB.
yingyinNormal.zh: 萨利，看看新闻，你成了英雄，每个人都要对此习以为常，包括国家运输安全委员会。

yingyinNormal.en: The DA's office will then consider leniency in any charges related to the case. Including first-degree murder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后地检署会根据你的指控酌情考虑宽大处理的。可能包括一级谋杀的指控。

yingyinNormal.en: We're leading global efforts to address climate change including last month's joint announcement with China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们领导着全球解决气候变化问题的努力，包括上个月和中国所发表的联合宣言。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you guys, listen, this weekend we're all gonna go to Las Vegas to surprise Joey. Including me. You wanna go?
yingyinNormal.zh: 注意，这周末大家一起去拉斯维加斯，给乔伊一个惊喜，包括我！你们要去吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Was that a flask? Yes. I've decided to embrace all of the traditions associated with prom, including spiking the Punch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是酒壶吗？是的，我决定接受所有和舞会相关的传统，包括在潘趣酒里掺烈酒。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The link was not as strong when they factored in the effects of certain health behaviors, <highlight>including</highlight> exercise levels, sleep habits and diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们考虑到某些健康行为的影响时，包括锻炼水平、睡眠习惯和饮食，这种联系并不明显。

examination_example.sentence: Several European capitals, <highlight>including</highlight> Paris and Berlin, are leading a campaign for tougher regulation by the European Union.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括巴黎和柏林在内的几个欧洲国家的首都，正在领导一场由欧盟实施更严格监督的运动。

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why visitors to the UK should be exempt from taxation—particularly when vital local services <highlight>including</highlight> waste collection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有理由认为来英国的游客应该免税——尤其是在包括垃圾收集在内的重要本地服务方面。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Genes and the environment interact in many complex ways to shape individuals and guide their behavior, <highlight>including</highlight> their curiosity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基因和环境以许多复杂的方式相互作用，塑造个体，引导他们的行为，包括他们的好奇心。

examination_example.sentence: The whole village chips in to help, <highlight>including</highlight> the kids, who end up developing their baking skills at an early age.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 整个村子都会参与进来，包括孩子们，所以他们在很小的时候就能学习烘焙。

examination_example.sentence: In the rare cases we have seen bad behavior, we have taken strong action in response, <highlight>including</highlight> banning a customer from the store.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们看到不良行为的罕见情况下，我们采取了强有力的行动作为回应，包括禁止一名顾客进入商店。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Most universities host welcome events before the academic year officially begins, <highlight>including</highlight> freshmen orientations (迎新会), campus picnics, and entertainments like concerts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数大学在学年正式开始前都会举办欢迎活动，包括新生迎新会、校园野餐和音乐会等娱乐活动。

examination_example.sentence: Wang's courage won him several honors, <highlight>including</highlight> a National May Day Labor Medal and 11 Citations of Merit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 王的勇气为他赢得了多项荣誉，包括全国五一劳动奖章和11次嘉奖令。

examination_example.sentence: Some pieces of music can go for 40 minutes and require up to 50 page turns, <highlight>including</highlight> back turns for repeat passages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些音乐片段可以长达40分钟，需要多达50页的翻页，包括重复段落的向后翻页。

examination_example.sentence: Different chemicals produced different colors of flames, <highlight>including</highlight> bright orange and dark green.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同的化学物质产生不同颜色的火焰，包括亮橙色和深绿色。

examination_example.sentence: I had a big family, <highlight>including</highlight> my sister, Chrissy, and a little brother, Patrick, whom I loved greatly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我有一个大家庭，包括我的妹妹Chrissy和一个小弟弟Patrick，我非常爱我的弟弟。

examination_example.sentence: All the lights in our flat turned off, <highlight>including</highlight> the TV.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们公寓里所有的灯都关了，包括电视。
